original_text: And it came to pass, when she pressed him daily with her words, and urged him, so that his soul was vexed unto death;
korean_text: 날마다 그 말로 그를 재촉하여 조르매 삼손의 마음이 번뇌하여 죽을 지경이라

sentences.original_text: when she pressed him daily with her words
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 날마다 그에게 말로 강요할 때

sentences.original_text: so that his soul was vexed unto death
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 그의 영혼이 죽을 만큰 괴로워지니라
